ch.cern.dbod.util

Class EGroupHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.cern.dbod.util.EGroupHelper

  • public class EGroupHelper
extends Object
    Helper to manage e-groups. It also provides a static method to check if a group is in a list of groups. To manage e-groups, it makes use of CERN SOAP Web Services using the Axis 1.4 library. More information about CERN SOAP Web Services can be found here https://espace.cern.ch/e-groups-help
    Author:
    Daniel Gomez Blanco

      • groupInList

        public static boolean groupInList(String group,
                  String groups)
        Checks if a group is in a list of groups.
        Parameters:
        group - group to check
        groups - groups to check, separated by ";"
        Returns:
        true if the group is in the list, false otherwise

      • createEGroup

        public boolean createEGroup(String eGroupName,
                   String instanceName,
                   long userCCID,
                   boolean ownerIsMember)
        Creates a new eGroup for the given user and instance with the given instance name.
        Parameters:
        eGroupName - name for the e-group to be created.
        instanceName - name of the instance.
        userCCID - id number of the owner of this e-group.
        ownerIsMember - indicates if the owner should be added as member or not.
        Returns:
        true if the creation was successful.

      • addEgroupToOEM

        public boolean addEgroupToOEM(String instanceName,
                     String egroup)
        Creates an e-group to be assigned to a role on OEM, and adds the given e-group to it. It also adds the created e-group to the groups managed by OEM.
        Parameters:
        instanceName - name of the instance to add
        egroup - name of the e-group given by the user
        Returns:
        true if the operation is successful

      • removeEgroupFromOEM

        public boolean removeEgroupFromOEM(String instanceName)
        Removes the e-group associated to a role from the master e-group and deletes it.
        Parameters:
        instanceName - name of the instance to remove
        Returns:
        true if the operation is successful

      • changeEgroupInOEM

        public boolean changeEgroupInOEM(String instanceName,
                        String oldEgroup,
                        String newEgroup)
        Changes the e-group associated with an instance in OEM
        Parameters:
        instanceName - name of the instance to change
        oldEgroup - old e-group
        newEgroup - new e-group
        Returns:
        true if the operation is successful
